resources.description:
B runs on lane n°2, A runs in wrong way on lane n°2.
A and B carry on without steering or braking.
Following impact, B is turned upside down and A points in the right way of traffic.

Tags:
- TFE-06-10 
- TFE-02-01
- Fontal collision
- Type of functional failures : Overall
- View obstruction due to road alignment (curve)

A runs on lane n°1, overtaking another vehicle running on lane n°2.

A overtakes, sets right indicator on. A begins sudden lane change from lane n°1 to the right, loses control then crosses sliding  lanes n°2 and n°3.

A hits the grassy slope on the right of emergency lane
A rolls over several times on the shoulder, ejecting one of its occupants in the process.

A is lying on roof on the shoulder. One of A's occupants is also lying on the shoulder. 

Tags:
- Type of functional failures : Action
- Loss of control
- Inexperienced driver

A runs on lane n°1 and B running on lane n°2.
A overtakes B, sets right indicator on.
A begins lane change from lane n°1 to the right, loses control then crosses lane n°2 sliding.
B steers left to avoid the collision with A and brakes
A bounces off the guardrail on the right side of the road and slides towards central reservation.
B steers right, adapting to A's new trajectory, and brakes.
B crushes A against guardrail.

Tags:
- Loss of control
- Type of functional failures : Action
- TFE-03-01

Accident involves a passenger car A. Due to the distraction driver A deviates from lane n°2 to grassy shoulder. In order to level out the vehicle A swerves to the left, losses control and hits the shoulder.

Type of functional failures : Execution
Loss of control
TFE-01-01

A runs on lane n°2, B walks on lane n°2 ahead of A.
B totters on the right side of lane n°2, A carries on without seeing him.
A brakes and drives towards the emergency lane.Collision with pedestrian

Tags:
- TFE-06-07 Type of functional failures : Overall
- TFE-06-10
- Unlit pedestrian, without reflective clothing , alcoholic

Accident involves a pedestrian Y and a passenger car A. 
A runs on lane n°3 ahead of A, Y is on lane n°1 ahead of A.
Y crosses the lanes n°1 and n°2 and moves towards lane n°3, and hits by the A. 
Y is ejected on the emergency lane and A escapes.


Collision with pedestrian

Y is ejected on the emergency lane and A escapes.

A runs on the lane n°3 (100 km/h). B is stopped on the shelter ahead of A. Y is descended of B and is behind B.
A leaves the lane n°3 and moves toward shelter. 
A hits Y
Y is projected over the guardrail.
A continues on the shelter/reserved lane
A hits B.
B is projected, 
it rolls onto its right side across the shelter.
 A is stopped on the shelter . 
Y is lying on the shoulder.
Collision with pedestrian

The accident involves 4 passenger cars  (A, B, C, D), a passenger car E (without occupant in the vehicle) and a pedestrian Y. 
Due to the heavy traffic A is stopped on lane n°1 near the left guardrail 
B runs on the lane n°1 (low speed due to the traffic) ahead A 
C runs on the lane n°1 (low speed due to the traffic) ahead B 
D runs on the lane n°3 (low speed due to the traffic) ahead C
E breakdown and is stopped  in the tunnel on the emergency lane and near the shelter
Pedestrian Y (driver of the vehicle E) is on the emergency lane at the back of  his vehicle 

Driver A  accelerates brutally and hits B
B is propelled forward and hits C
A accelerates again and hits B
A changes to the lane n°3 from the lane n°1 and hits D
A overtakes D by the left first hits Y then E.


Collision with pedestrian 
Tunnel

Accident involves a passenger car A, passenger car B (without occupant) and a pedestrian Y (driver of B).
B is stopped on the emergency lane (vehicle breakdown) and Y is in front of th B.

A runs on the lane n°3 , arriving at the tails of traffic jams, A moves to the emergency lane (without breaking) and hits  B, the B hits the pedestrian Y.

Collision with pedestrian

Types of functional failures : Detection, Decision

Truck A runs in lane n°2 behind the vehicle B. The tractor-trailer moves towards the emergency lane when the truck arrives next to the vehicle B. 
Pedestrian Y (driver vehicle  B) is on the emergency lane , in limit of lane n°2, using a jack to raise the vehicle B.
Pedestrian Z is looking at tools in the trunck. 
The tractor hits vehicle B on the left rear and hits the pedestrian Y. The pedestrian Y is ejected forward.
As the consequence of the impact, the vehicle B hits pedestrian Z. 
Vehicle B stopped on the emergency lane fter the bursting left tyre..
Pedestrian Y lying on the emergency lane ahead vehicle B.
Truck A stopped on the emergency lane ahead pedestrian Y. Pedestrian Z behind the vehicle B.



Collision with pedestrian

Type of functional failure: detection
